title: black screen help

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
i decided to come back to league after awhile now every time i go to open the client it just stays black i have told riot support and his gave me like 15 things to do not 1 has worked i don't even think the guy knows what to do anymore. Any help. picture of it I've waited near a hour just stays black

https://gyazo.com/19aa38b59094b84d2f9fe4e436d253e8

replies.body:
Hey there,

That seems odd, have you tried [reinstalling the game completely](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends)?

> [{quoted}](name=SephirothSG,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=ic0rF9mz,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-13T09:43:00.946+0000)
>
> Hey there,
> 
> That seems odd, have you tried [reinstalling the game completely](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends)?

um yes deleting from control panel then deleting riot games folder?
